verses.name: Job 5:19
verses.text: He shall deliver thee in six troubles: yea, in seven there shall no evil touch thee.

verses.name: Job 5:20
verses.text: In famine he shall redeem thee from death: and in war from the power of the sword.

verses.name: Job 5:21
verses.text: Thou shalt be hid from the scourge of the tongue: neither shalt thou be afraid of destruction when it cometh.

verses.name: Job 5:22
verses.text: At destruction and famine thou shalt laugh: neither shalt thou be afraid of the beasts of the earth.

verses.name: Job 5:23
verses.text: For thou shalt be in league with the stones of the field: and the beasts of the field shall be at peace with thee.
